EmailTemplate.subject: 46% Of VDI Projects Stall, Donâ€™t Let Yours Be One Of Them
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-opensky-vdi-orchestration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_love&utm_content=wcast>
We love webinars <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-opensky-vdi-orchestration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_love&utm_content=wcast>, they're informative, quick, and far superior to reading. In fact we love them so much that we want to share them with you!
Join OpenSky's Don McKeith to learn how he helped a Fortune 50 International Health Insurer develop a ground-up orchestration framework for its virtual infrastructure, and onboard more than 25,000 zero-downtime VDI seats in less than four years.
How quickly could {{company.company name:default=your company}} scale if the business called for it? Watch here to glean insights for your team directly from Mr. McKeith. <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-opensky-vdi-orchestration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_love&utm_content=wcast>
See, webinars are awesome!
- The VMTurbo Team
